sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RABASTENS a city of France, in the department of the Tarn, and arrondisement of Caillac. It is situated on the right bank of the river Tarn, and is but poorly built, but in 1836 it contained 6966 inhabitants, who were employed in making woollen cloths, and producing some good wine. Lat. 43. 50. Long. 1. 37. E.
